MTA New York Transit

Heavily inspired by MTA Graphics Standards Manual Book, and I’ve planned for rebranding MTA System since I moved to New York. Also, it’s interesting to imagine living in a dystopian world especially in New York. Where full of technologies and commute is an important part of everyone’s daily life. Moreover, I envision how New York be like comparing to Los Angeles in Blade Runner 2049, the theme has merged a bit with grunge, steampunk style(But New York is grunge and dirty in the real-life though)
